name: Marie Curie
what_did:
Marie Curie studied radioactivity, a powerful type of energy.
She discovered two new elements: polonium and radium.
She was the first woman to win a Nobel Prize, and the only person to win in two different sciences.
why_matters:
Curie opened new doors in science, especially for women.
Her research helped develop X-rays and cancer treatments.
She showed that hard work and curiosity can change the world.

fun_fact: She carried test tubes of glowing radium in her pockets!
